text: Hĩndĩ ĩyo mũtumia ũcio agĩthiĩ kũrĩ andũ othe arĩ na mataaro macio make ma ũũgĩ, nao magĩtinia mũtwe wa Sheba mũrũ wa Bikiri, makĩũikĩria Joabu. Nĩ ũndũ ũcio Joabu akĩhuha karumbeta, nao andũ ake makĩharagana kuuma itũũra-inĩ, o mũndũ agĩcooka gwake mũciĩ. Nake Joabu agĩcooka kũrĩ mũthamaki kũu Jerusalemu.
